name: Shadow Crusader 3 (UE4)
description:
This is a game I made for college. It is the third installment of a sci-fi third-person shooter adventure, where we will play one of Kalamit's clones (a great warrior for whom today everyone fights for her genes).

Assets: UE4 Starter Content / Mixamo Adobe Fuse (Kalamit)

Sounds:  https://freesound.org/ - MGS PSX
